data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Börtala Mongol with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Börtala Mongol, Xinjiang Uygur, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Börtala Mongol who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary: On average, 50 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Börtala Mongol, Xinjiang Uygur, China.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Over 90.8 percent of the people of Börtala Mongol are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, please raise up prophets in Börtala Mongol who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Tatar people.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Börtala Mongol, Xinjiang Uygur, China a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of Börtala Mongol an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.section_summary:
the county of Börtala Mongol, Xinjiang Uygur, China has a population of 397,400.

We estimate Börtala Mongol has 30,147 people who might know Jesus, 6,420 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 360,833 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Börtala Mongol, Xinjiang Uygur, China that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.
